mapper.sql: select title_id, list_list_id, t.name as name, create_date_utc AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' as create_date_utc, status_status_id, vt.type_id, vt.name as type_name from lists.titles t inner join lists.video_types vt on vt.type_id = t.type_type_id
mapper.select: select max("title_id")+1 as res from lists.titles
mapper.insert: insert into lists.titles(title_id, name, create_date_utc, list_list_id, status_status_id, type_type_id) values(#{titleId},#{name},#{createDateUTC},#{watchListId},#{statusId},#{typeId})
